name: Voyage For Survival (2009)
description:
Uploaded for reference, feel free to have a mess with it.

This is unfinished and I've just checked it and it seems you cannot get to the rec  tier after the first mission/task. If there is interest I might take a look again some time, but I'd be better off remaking it from scratch in unity or something now.

An ambitious proper sequel to the first game, this had a revamped quest system, full dialogue trees, characters, vehicles, and 3 branching stories, scout/medic/soldier.

Unfortunately, either Flash (at the time) or my PC got to a point where it could no longer publish it due to size. I would get memory issues and it just wouldn't publish. My fault for choosing the wrong engine!

Every line of code was written from scratch in AS3, and all assets created by me, it was a real labour of love! But sometimes you have to let go of things.

I sent this to PCGamer too, and got feedback which was nice. Mainly about how wooden the animation was. this was fair enough. I tend to agree. :D
